import React, { useState, useRef } from "react"; import { Container, Row, Col, Form, Button, Card } from "react-bootstrap"; import html2canvas from "html2canvas"; import "./App.css"; function App() { const [screenshot, setScreenshot] = useState({ username: "Áî®Êà∑Âêç", keepTitle: "Keep¬∑Êà∑Â§ñË∑ëÊ≠•", miles: 3.72, pace: "07'28\"", duration: "00:27:47", calories: 266, date: new Date(2024, 9, 13, 21, 29), // 2024/10/13 21:29 temperature: 12, humidity: 23, }); const [bgImage, setBgImage] = useState("/images/bg1_1.png"); const newImgRef = useRef(null); const handleInputChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setScreenshot((prev) => ({ ...prev, [name]: value })); }; const handleBgImageChange = (e) => { const selectedBg = e.target.value; setBgImage(selectedBg); }; const generateScreenshot = () => { html2canvas(newImgRef.current).then((canvas) => { const link = document.createElement("a"); link.download = `keep${screenshot.date.getMonth() + 1}Êúà${screenshot.date.getDate()}Êó•Ë∑ëÊ≠•ÊâìÂç°.png`; link.href = canvas.toDataURL(); link.click(); }); }; return (
